name: Kricketot
description: The Cricket Pokémon. It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.

abilities.name: Shed Skin
abilities.description: If this Pokémon is affected by a negative status ailment, they can roll a d4 at the end of each of their turns. On a result of 4, they are cured.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.
